listings.headline: 3 Bed flat for sale
listings.description: Spanning over 625 square feet which gives an exceptional pound per square foot price of Â£648, this great flat in SW11 is an ideal purchase for a first time buyer looking to take advantage of the stamp duty change. The property is in a great location and is a short stroll from the Thames Walk which is one of the most scenic walks in London, it is also ideal for cycling into the City along the Thames path.
